content: आपत्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [आ-पद्-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Turning or changing into, entering into any state or condition. {@--2@} Obtaining, procuring, getting; स्थानापत्तेर्द्रव्येषु धर्मलाभः <ls>Kāty.</ls> {@--3@} Misfortune, calamity, adversity; <ls>Y. 3. 42.</ls> {@--4@} A fault, transgression. {@--5@} Remonstrance, expostulation. {@--6@} (In <ab>phil.</ab>) An undesirable conclusion or occurrence (अनिष्टप्रसंग).
